steps.title: Welcome to Nexus
steps.body: This walkthrough will create a real campaign end to end. We will start in Clients, then create or select a client, create a campaign, build it, review, launch, monitor, and report.

steps.title: Open Clients
steps.body: All work begins here. Click Clients in the sidebar to view or create organizations.

steps.title: Create or select a client
steps.body: Option A: Click New Client to create Regional Food Bank. Option B: If Regional Food Bank already exists, click it to open.
steps.tip: In demo mode we seed Regional Food Bank so you can select it immediately.

steps.title: Client dashboard
steps.body: You are now in the client dashboard. View performance metrics and navigate to campaigns, analytics, or reports.

steps.title: Open campaigns
steps.body: Navigate to the campaigns section to view and create campaigns for this client.

steps.title: Create a campaign
steps.body: Click New Campaign to create your End-of-Year Holiday Campaign. Fill in the details and set your fundraising goal.

steps.title: Build the plan
steps.body: Add overview, upload assets, add segments Current Donors, Lapsed Donors, Volunteers, assign collaborators if needed.
steps.tip: Import your Track15 templates to prefill calendars and tags.

steps.title: View campaigns
steps.body: See your campaign in the list. Click on it to edit, or create additional campaigns as needed.

steps.title: Monitor performance
steps.body: Track campaign performance, donor demographics, and trends in the Analytics section.

steps.title: Generate reports
steps.body: Create fundraising reports, donor analyses, and campaign performance summaries to share with stakeholders.

steps.title: Pro Navigation Tips
steps.body: Use the Client and Campaign switchers in the top bar for quick navigation. The sidebar shows your current client's sections. Try keyboard shortcuts: g+c for clients, g+d for dashboard, g+p for campaigns, g+a for analytics, g+r for reports.
